DOC.brief_summary: Demonstrate concomitant synchronous use supracervical balloon vaginal misoprostol induction labour , vaginal delivery achieve less time compare vaginal misoprostol alone .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Vaginal Misoprostol Plus Supracervical Balloon Versus Vaginal Misoprostol Alone Induction Labor
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Singleton pregnancy Cephalic presentation Reassuring fetal heart rate pattern Intact membrane Bishop score less 6 Exclusion criterion Severe preeclampsia Prematurity ( < 37 week gestation date first trimester ultrasound ) Previous cesarean section previous uterine surgery Intrauterine growth restriction Premature rupture membrane Maternal colonization Streptococcus Agalactiae time pregnancy Multifetal pregnancy Breech presentation Stillbirth Any contraindication vaginal delivery
